nlacp: Employees ranked as professors or tenured assistant professors can select from, insert into, and delete from graduate admission related tables in the database.
Customer Service Reps, Pharmacists, and Billing Reps can collect and use customer name and date of birth to help confirm identity.
Customer service reps can use credit card number for the purpose of updating records if requested by a patient.
Customer Service Reps, Pharmacists, and Billing Reps can collect and use customer name and e-mail addresses.
Shipping Reps can use customer name and customer mailing addresses to ship orders.
Billing Reps can use credit card numbers for order processing.
Customer Service Reps can modify credit card numbers for order processing, if the customer is notified by email of the change.

truth.subject: customer service rep
truth.condition: customer is notified by email of the change

policy.subject: customer service rep
policy.condition: customer is notified by email of the change

nlacp: Customer service reps, ducks or Lawyers can use credit card number for the purpose of making treatment decisions if customer has opted-in.
Admission nurses use SSN for reviewing eligibility if requested by a patient who is returning.

truth.subject: admission nurse
truth.condition: requested by a patient who is returning

policy.subject: admission nurse
policy.condition: requested by a patient who is returning

nlacp: Customer service reps and managers may collect and use name and social security number for the purpose of confirming identity.
The organisation may use email addresses to answer inquiries.
Supervisors can collect personal information if required by law.
Financial consultants can collect and use customer name for the purpose of confirming identity.
Financial analysts can use customer accounts to make loan decisions.
Management can report customer transactions if required by law.
The director chooses options from the package to give to all employees.
He or she also can read the information about the distribution of options.

truth.subject: he
truth.resource: information about the distribution of option

truth.subject: she
truth.resource: information about the distribution of option

policy.subject: she
policy.resource: information about the distribution of options

policy.subject: he
policy.resource: information about the distribution of options

nlacp: The director can promote an employee to be a  manager.
An employee can appoint another employee to be his advocate, and have read access to his bonus information – for example, this might be useful if he needs help from a trade union.

truth.subject: employee
truth.purpose: have read access to his bonus information

nlacp: For example, write a check use case should be invoked by (authorized to) clerk role.
If the invoice’s total amount exceeds one million, then two different supervisors must authorize the invoice.

truth.subject: supervisor
truth.condition: invoices total amount exceeds one million

policy.subject: supervisor
policy.condition: invoices total amount exceeds one million

nlacp: A professor can review the same project at most one time.
Only the business office manager and the dean can approve a project.
The PC chair appoints the PC members.
A PC member can resign his membership.
The reviewer of a paper can assign the paper to be sub-reviewed by an agent who is not an author of the paper and has not been assigned the same paper by another reviewer.

truth.subject: reviewer
truth.purpose: be subreviewed by an agent who is not an author of the paper and has not been assigned the same paper by another reviewer

policy.subject: reviewer
policy.purpose: be subreviewed by an agent who is not an author of the paper and has not been assigned the same paper by another reviewer

nlacp: All members of Faculty can Assign both InternalGrades and ExternalGrades.
Requests for students to Receive ExternalGrades, and for faculty to Assign and View both InternalGrades and ExternalGrades, will succeed.
The sole counter-example shows that a student with the freedom to assign external grades is also a ta but not a faculty member.

policy.subject: none
policy.condition: subject is not a faculty member

nlacp: All members of role Faculty Family can receive External-Grades.
If the subject is a faculty member, then permit that subject to assign grades.
If the subject is not a faculty member, then permit that subject to enroll in courses.

truth.subject: subject
truth.condition: subject is not a faculty member

policy.subject: subject
policy.condition: subject is not a faculty member

nlacp: The manager has the broadest access to the information, including access to personal, financial, clinical and medical information about each resident.
Only the manager is allowed to add a new resident to the system and to start or update the care plan of a resident.
The care plan is updated in consultation with the resident or the responsible person.
Only the manager is allowed to delete the information about a resident but here also that right is restricted.
The health care workers are required to sign a confidentiality agreement before they have access to any resident data.
Their main form of access is to view the care plan for each resident and to add progress note entries based on their observations.
Access to emergency details is available for all staff.
For a special purpose, access to an older medical record can be sought and obtained from the manager.
A visiting doctor has access to all the medical information of residents who are his or her patients and can add entries to their medical records.
Occasionally, due to pressing circumstances, it may be necessary for a visiting doctor to examine a resident who is not normally his or her patient.
This is permitted with the consent of the resident or the responsible person and the notification of the manager.
Privacy laws require, however, that a person should have full access to any information stored about them (unless the well-being of a third party would be jeopardised by revealing the information).

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: well being of a third party would not be jeopardised

policy.subject: person
policy.condition: well being of a third party would not be jeopardised

nlacp: A user should already grant diagnosing right to create medicine orders.
Only one user, here is the Pharmacy System, can load medicines to the medicine dispenser.

policy.subject: pharmacy system
policy.condition: it is loading medicines to the medicine dispenser

nlacp: Pharmacy System may get reports and status information of the medicine dispenser.

truth.subject: pharmacy system
truth.resource: status information of the medicine dispenser

policy.subject: pharmacy system
policy.resource: status information of the medicine dispenser

nlacp: Pharmacy System can load medicines to the dispenser only at a time interval 12:00-13:00 in a day.

truth.subject: pharmacy system
truth.condition: at a time interval 12:0013:00 in a day

policy.subject: pharmacy system
policy.condition: at a time interval 12:0013:00 in a day

nlacp: Only Doctors and Nurses can read patient records.
Any subject with an e-mail name in the med.example.com domain can perform any action on any resource.

truth.subject: subject
truth.condition: email name in the med.example.com domain

policy.subject: subject
policy.condition: email name in the med.example.com domain

nlacp: A person, identified by his or her patient number, may read any record for which he or she is the designated patient.
A person may read any record for which he or she is the designated parent or guardian, and for which the patient is under 16 years of age.

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: person is the designated parent or guardian

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: the patient is under 16 years of age

policy.subject: person
policy.condition: person is the designated parent or guardian

nlacp: A physician may write to any medical element for which he or she is the designated primary care physician, provided an email is sent to the patient.

truth.subject: physician
truth.condition: email is sent to the patient

policy.subject: physician
policy.condition: email is sent to the patient

nlacp: Administrators can access only the administrative pages
Guests can access all the public areas of the site
Owners can access their account, move funds, and review transactions.
Planners can access the sites financial planning and tax preparation functions
Payers can use the site's bill paying function .
Data Owners can transfer ownership of information to other users.
Data Owners can determine the type of access given to other users (read, write, copy, etc.).
Users who do not have access to information should not be able to determine its characteristics (file size, file name, directory path, etc.)

truth.subject: user
truth.condition: users do not have access to information

policy.subject: users
policy.condition: users do not have access to information

nlacp: All users can read from a lower classification than the one they are granted (A "secret" user can read an unclassified document).
All users can write to a higher classification (A "secret" user can post information to a Top Secret resource).
All users are given read or write access to objects only of the same classification (a "secret" user can only read or write to a secret document).
Staff can print on HP Laserjet 1.
David can assign the manager role to Alice.
John can assign clerk to users from department A
Clerk can read from database.
Owners can read Name.
Clerks can add and change the Name, the date of birth, the Address and the Postcode.
All members of FACULTY can ASSIGN both INTERNALGRADES and EXTERNALGRADES.
All members of STUDENT can RECEIVE EXTERNALGRADES.
During the submission phase, an author may submit a paper.
During the review phase, reviewer may submit a review for paper if reviewer is assigned to review paper.

truth.subject: reviewer
truth.condition: reviewer is assigned to review paper

policy.subject: reviewer
policy.condition: reviewer is assigned to review paper

nlacp: During the meeting phase, reviewer can read the scores for paper if reviewer has submitted a review for paper.

truth.subject: reviewer
truth.condition: reviewer has submitted a review for paper

policy.subject: reviewer
policy.condition: reviewer has submitted a review for paper

nlacp: In the current paper system, all the information stored about a resident is accessible to the resident by arrangement with the manager.
Managers can read and set ordinary employees’ bonuses, but not those of other managers or the director.
Supervisor can not  execute the write a check use case.
For example, a user should not record and verify the same invoice.
Every subject in the hierarchy except the business office manager can submit a project.
Every professor, except assistant professors, can review a project.
A subject cannot review a project he or she has submitted.
A subject cannot approve projects he or she has reviewed or submitted.

policy.subject: subject
policy.resource: projects he or she has reviewed

policy.subject: subject
policy.resource: projects he or she has submitted

nlacp: Authors of papers cannot be changed.
The PC chair can assign a paper to a PC member for reviewing, except if he is one of its authors.

truth.subject: pc chair
truth.condition: he is one of its author

policy.subject: pc chair
policy.condition: he is one of its authors

nlacp: All PC members, except the author(s) of a paper can know who are the reviewers for this paper.
A reviewer of a paper can resign, unless he has already appointed a sub-reviewer for the paper.

truth.subject: reviewer
truth.condition: he has already appointed a subreviewer for the paper

policy.subject: reviewer
policy.condition: he has already appointed a subreviewer for the paper

nlacp: A sub-reviewer can resign, unless he has already submitted his review.

truth.subject: subreviewer
truth.condition: he has not submitted his review

policy.subject: subreviewer
policy.condition: he has already submitted his review

nlacp: There do not exist members of Student who can Assign ExternalGrades.
No combination of roles exists such that a user with those roles can both Receive and Assign the resource ExternalGrades.
TA can view and assign InternalGrades but not ExternalGrades (since faculty must take final responsibility for all external grades), combined with Pol3.
If the subject is a student, then do not permit that subject to assign grades.
Although she can enter the past medical records when a resident is admitted, she cannot subsequently add medical entries to the system.
Also, she cannot view the private notes of doctors and clearly she cannot sign the legal agreement on behalf of a resident.
Health care workers can view recent medical records of residents (up to one year old) but cannot normally view older medical information.
So, for example, the manager should be made aware of repeated attempts by a health care worker to access information beyond their rights.

policy.subject: manager
policy.resource: repeated attempts by a health care worker

nlacp: Doctors also can add private notes about a resident, which, on the basis of doctor-patient confidentiality, are not visible to health care staff or the manager.
The doctor then has temporary access to the resident’s medical records (but not to the private notes of the resident’s usual doctor).

policy.subject: doctor
policy.resource: private notes of the residents ordinary doctor

nlacp: In an electronic system we can allow residents to hook into the network at any time as long as they can view only their own data and cannot make arbitrary changes.

truth.subject: resident
truth.condition: they can view only their own data and cannot make arbitrary change

policy.subject: resident
policy.condition: they can view only their own data and cannot make arbitrary changes

nlacp: This critical task should not be performed by a single user.
However, it should not perform these operations when it is loading medicines to the medicine dispenser.

truth.subject: it
truth.condition: it is loading medicines to the medicine dispenser

policy.subject: it
policy.condition: it is loading medicines to the medicine dispenser

nlacp: Pharmacy System should not read patient records even if it can read patient medicine orders.
An administrator shall not be permitted to read or write to medical elements of a patient record.

policy.subject: administrator
policy.resource: medical elements of a patient record

policy.subject: administrator
policy.resource: medical elements of a patient record

nlacp: Users can view an Owner's account, but not make changes
Only administrators, not data owners, make changes to a resource's security label.
Owners cannot change any data but can read it all.
There do not exist members of STUDENT who can ASSIGN EXTERNALGRADES.
There exists no combination of roles such that a user with those roles can both RECEIVE and ASSIGN the resource EXTERNALGRADES.
If a subject is not a pc-chair or admin, then he or she may not set the meeting flag.

truth.subject: subject
truth.condition: subject is not a pcchair or admin

policy.subject: subject
policy.condition: subject is not a pcchair or admin

nlacp: If someone is not a pc-chair or admin, then he or she can never see paper-review-rc for which he or she is conflicted.

truth.subject: person
truth.condition: person is not a pcchair or admin

policy.subject: someone
policy.condition: subject is not a pcchair or admin

nlacp: Authors may never read scores.
Doctors need not sign a confidentiality agreement since they are bound by a code of professional conduct.
